citations.narrative:
Interior surfaces. There are some unsealed wood shelves and wooden boards in the former mouse building which now
houses hamsters. Interior building surfaces must be constructed and maintained so that surfaces are impervious to
moisture so that they can be repeatedly cleaned and sanitized and won't retain odors or moisture. Bare wood on hamsters
shelves and racks must be sealed or covered with an impervious surface. Correct by September 6, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.26(d) 
   
Facilities, indoor. 
Interior surfaces. There are some unsealed wood shelves and wooden boards in the former mouse building which now 
houses hamsters. Interior building surfaces must be constructed and maintained so that surfaces are impervious to 
moisture so that they can be repeatedly cleaned and sanitized and won't retain odors or moisture. Bare wood on hamsters 
shelves and racks must be sealed or covered with an impervious surface. Correct by September 6, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
